content:
TableProvider Class

In this Article

Provides the base class for Dynamic Data table providers.

Syntax

Declaration

public abstract class TableProvider

Inheritance Hierarchy

  • System.Object
  • TableProvider

Inherited Members

Equals(Object)
,
Equals(Object,Object)
,
GetHashCode()
,
GetType()
,
MemberwiseClone()
,
ReferenceEquals(Object,Object)

Remarks

Table providers must extend this class. LINQ to SQL classes and the ADO.NET Entity data model are providers that extend this class.

Constructors summary

TableProvider(DataModelProvider)

Initializes a new instance of the TableProvider class for use by an inherited class instance. This constructor can only be called by an inherited class.

Properties summary

Attributes

Gets the attributes that are defined for the table that is represented by this provider.
Columns

When overridden in a derived class, gets the collection of columns in this table.
DataContextPropertyName

Gets the name of the table from the data context.
DataModel

Gets the DataModelProvider object.
EntityType

Gets or sets the type that represents the table.
Name

Gets the name of the table.
ParentEntityType

Gets the parent type.
RootEntityType

Gets the root type for this entity.

Methods summary

CanDelete(IPrincipal)

Gets a value that indicates whether the user is allowed to delete items from the table.
CanInsert(IPrincipal)

Gets a value that indicates whether the user is allowed to insert items into the table.
CanRead(IPrincipal)

Gets a value that indicates whether the user is allowed to read items in the table.
CanUpdate(IPrincipal)

Gets a value that indicates whether the user is allowed to update items in the table.
EvaluateForeignKey(Object,String)

Returns the value of a foreign key for the specified row.
GetQuery(Object)

When overridden in a derived class, returns the IQueryable object that in turn returns the elements of the table.
GetTypeDescriptor()

Gets the type descriptor for the table.
ToString()

Returns the stem.Web.DynamicData.ModelProviders.TableProvider.Name* property of the TableProvider instance.

Constructors

  • TableProvider(DataModelProvider)

    Initializes a new instance of the TableProvider class for use by an inherited class instance. This constructor can only be called by an inherited class.

    protected TableProvider (System.Web.DynamicData.ModelProviders.DataModelProvider model);

    Parameters

    • model
      DataModelProvider

      The model that the table belongs to.

Properties

  • Attributes

    Gets the attributes that are defined for the table that is represented by this provider.

    public virtual System.ComponentModel.AttributeCollection Attributes { get; }

    Property Value

    • AttributeCollection

      The attribute collection.

  • Columns

    When overridden in a derived class, gets the collection of columns in this table.

    public abstract System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection<System.Web.DynamicData.ModelProviders.ColumnProvider> Columns { get; }

    Property Value

    • ReadOnlyCollection<ColumnProvider>

      The collection of columns in this table.

  • DataContextPropertyName

    Gets the name of the table from the data context.

    public virtual string DataContextPropertyName { get; protected set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      The name of the table.

  • DataModel

    Gets the DataModelProvider object.

    public System.Web.DynamicData.ModelProviders.DataModelProvider DataModel { get; }

    Property Value

    • DataModelProvider

      The DataModelProvider object.

    Remarks

    For more information, see ASP.NET Dynamic Data.

  • EntityType

    Gets or sets the type that represents the table.

    public virtual Type EntityType { get; protected set; }

    Property Value

    • Type

      The type that represents the table.

  • Name

    Gets the name of the table.

    public virtual string Name { get; protected set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      The name of the table.

    Remarks

    Typically, this is the name of the table property in the data-context class.

  • ParentEntityType

    Gets the parent type.

    public virtual Type ParentEntityType { get; protected set; }

    Property Value

    • Type

      The parent type if the entity has a parent; otherwise, an instance of the EntityType class.

  • RootEntityType

    Gets the root type for this entity.

    public virtual Type RootEntityType { get; protected set; }

    Property Value

    • Type

      The root type for this entity if the entity has a parent; otherwise, an instance of the EntityType class.

Methods

  • CanDelete(IPrincipal)

    Gets a value that indicates whether the user is allowed to delete items from the table.

    public virtual bool CanDelete (System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal principal);

    Parameters

    • principal
      IPrincipal

      The user.

    Returns

    • Boolean

      true if the user is allowed to delete items from the table; otherwise, false.

  • CanInsert(IPrincipal)

    Gets a value that indicates whether the user is allowed to insert items into the table.

    public virtual bool CanInsert (System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal principal);

    Parameters

    • principal
      IPrincipal

      The user.

    Returns

    • Boolean

      true if the user is allowed to insert items into the table; otherwise, false.

  • CanRead(IPrincipal)

    Gets a value that indicates whether the user is allowed to read items in the table.

    public virtual bool CanRead (System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal principal);

    Parameters

    • principal
      IPrincipal

      The user.

    Returns

    • Boolean

      true if the user is allowed to read items in the table; otherwise, false.

  • CanUpdate(IPrincipal)

    Gets a value that indicates whether the user is allowed to update items in the table.

    public virtual bool CanUpdate (System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal principal);

    Parameters

    • principal
      IPrincipal

      The user.

    Returns

    • Boolean

      true if the user is allowed to update items in the table; otherwise, false.

  • EvaluateForeignKey(Object,String)

    Returns the value of a foreign key for the specified row.

    public virtual object EvaluateForeignKey (object row, string foreignKeyName);

    Parameters

    • row
      System.Object

      The row to get the foreign-key value for.

    • foreignKeyName
      String

      The name of the foreign-key column.

    Returns

    • System.Object

      The foreign key.

  • GetQuery(Object)

    When overridden in a derived class, returns the IQueryable object that in turn returns the elements of the table.

    public abstract System.Linq.IQueryable GetQuery (object context);

    Parameters

    • context
      System.Object

      The data context for the table.

    Returns

    • IQueryable

      An IQueryable object that returns the elements of the table.

  • GetTypeDescriptor()

    Gets the type descriptor for the table.

    public virtual System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor GetTypeDescriptor ();

    Returns

    • ICustomTypeDescriptor

      The type descriptor for the table.

  • ToString()

    Returns the stem.Web.DynamicData.ModelProviders.TableProvider.Name* property of the TableProvider instance.

    public override string ToString ();

    Returns

    • String

      The name of the TableProvider instance. If the stem.Web.DynamicData.ModelProviders.TableProvider.Name* property is null, the base class Name property is returned.

    Remarks

    This method is intended for debugging purposes.
